column3: what about "more than 100 GBs" so it actually brings some information? Please also fix the commit message typo.
ACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9995/commits/6be66aed3df2271132d2540f24db6e49e3cf947d\n\nThis is very easy to review now, few ACKs please.

While you're updating this you might as well mention pruning. "Downloads and, by default, stores the entire history".
